text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking solid with 7 ft @ 14s WNW swell and light 12 mph S winds. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are prime spots, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 10s WSW with fresh 15 mph S winds, still offering some fun at the sheltered corners. By the day after, conditions worsen with 4 ft @ 10s W swell and stronger 20 mph SSW winds, making it poor across the board. Best: today.
